Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33064 affecting package libsndfile for versions less than 1.2.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-33064 affecting package libsndfile for versions less than 1.2.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsndfile is earlier than 1.2.2-1, affected by CVE-2022-33064
